name: Duskblade of Draktharr
tooltip:
Duskblade of Draktharr

Cost: 3200
+20 Ability Haste
+55 Attack Damage

+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)

UNIQUE Passive - Nightstalker: Basic attacking an enemy champion deals 100 (+ 30% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown). Champion takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
